effects:
Gain access to following skills for 20 turns:
	Aqua Prison+2 (506520)
	Dualcast+2 (506500)
	Elemental Power+2 (506530)
	Swift Current+2 (506510)
name: Forbidden Arts
Forbidden Arts
禁術
금지된 술법
Arts interdits
Verbotene Künste
Artes prohibidas
desc_short: Enable dualcast, swift current, aqua prison, and elemental power for 20 turns
20回合內可以使用「連續詠唱」「急流」「水業牢籠」「元素之力」
20턴 동안 '연속 마법', '급류', '물의 감옥', '원소의 힘' 사용 가능
Permet d'utiliser Double sort, Courant rapide, Prison aquatique et Puissance élémentaire pendant 20 tours
Ermöglicht fünf Runden lang Doppelmagie, Flinke Strömung, Aquagefängnis und Elementarkraft.
Aprende Magia doble, Corriente potente, Prisión acuática y Poder elemental durante 20 turnos
